mapper.select: select * from TBL_BBS ORDER BY BBS_NUM DESC
select * from TBL_BBS ORDER BY BBS_NUM DESC OFFSET #{page} ROW FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT B.*, DECODE( TO_CHAR(CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(CDATETIME,'HH24:MI:SS') , TO_CHAR(CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AS CDATE, NVL(CCNT, 0) AS COMMENTCNT FROM TBL_BOARD B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARDNO, COUNT(*) AS CCNT FROM TBL_COMMENT GROUP BY BOARDNO ) T ON T.BOARDNO = B.BOARDNO WHERE 1=1
AND KIND = #{kind}
AND (TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword} ||'%' OR USERID LIKE '%'||#{keyword} || '%' )
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword} ||'%'
AND USERID LIKE '%'||#{keyword} ||'%'
ORDER BY B.CDATETIME DESC
ORDER BY B.BOARDNO ASC
ORDER BY TITLE ASC
ORDER BY CNT DESC
OFFSET #{page} ROW FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BBS VALUES ( BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{userId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
